Judul: NUMERICAL MODELING OF TIME LAPSE MICROGRAVITY  METHOD FOR WATER INJECTION SIMULATION
Abstrak:
So far the application of time lapse microgravity method for monitoring of injection water 
front has been based on changes of the gravity or density value and the apparent fluid 
saturation. Unfortunately, the formulation used has not yet involved a fluid flow 
formulation. The fluid flow formulation, however, is an important aspect that implicates
effects of gravity, pressure, permeability, fluid viscosity, and fluid saturation. Therefore, 
this preliminary study is intended to simulate water front of injection using the fluid flow 
formulation in which the gravity effect is quantified by time lapse microgravity method. 
We apply the 3D numerical approximation of two-phase immiscible and incompressible 
problems using the IMPES method. The basic method used is a finite-volume scheme to 
approach the pressure equation and a finite-difference scheme to discretize the saturation 
equation. Numerical simulation results show that water front of injection and concentration
history of the displacing fluid which represents fluid saturation can be identified.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Djoko Santoso, Wawan Gunawan A. Kadir, Darharta Dahrin
Kata Kunci: NUMERICAL MODELING OF TIME LAPSE MICROGRAVITY  METHOD FOR WATER INJECTION SIMULATION
